content.content: There was a presentation on Oracles at the governance call on February 27th. It garnered a lot of discussion around the Oracles, and I’m more than happy to answer any questions. The Oracle Governance Framework draft will be published in the forum by the end of next week so the community can start giving feedback and iterating on the document. There will be a review period of two weeks, before it will go to a Governance Polling Vote. I’ve posted the presentation in PDF form below so there’s a public record.   drive.google.com    Oracles Governance Feb 2020.pdf Google Drive file.

Great presentation @NikKunkel … do you have any external resources/white papers/templates that you are using as references while working on the Oracle Governance Framework draft? Background reading on this topic in anticipation of draft would be fascinating.
